scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:agent
scripts.build:server: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t maca134/rsnapshot-docker-server:latest --target release ./server --push
scripts.build:agent: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t maca134/rsnapshot-docker-agent:latest --target release ./agent --push
